articles.title: Detained Tufts student’s lawyers push for restoration of her student record
articles.description:
The removal of Rümeysa Öztürk’s student record since her release from ICE custody has kept her from teaching and research opportunities.

articles.title: Felony riot charges dropped against Oct. 7 pro-Palestinian protestors, now facing misdemeanors

The riot charges were initially added to misdemeanor charges that the protesters were facing, but have since been dropped.
